name: Strong Comeback
description: You learn quickly from past mistakes.
benefit: Whenever you are allowed to reroll an ability check, a skill check, or a saving throw, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on the reroll.
mythicDescription: You never make the same mistake twice.
mythicBenefit: Whenever you’re allowed to reroll an ability check, a skill check, or a saving throw, roll two dice and take the higher result, before adding the bonus from Strong Comeback.
description_zh: 你从过去犯下的错误中学到很多东西。
benefit_zh: 每当你能够对一次属性检定、技能检定或豁免检定进行重骰时，重骰获得+2环境加值。
